logo_dark.description: Primary logo for light backgrounds - Dark slate text with pink accent dot on 'i'

brand_usage_guide.logo_spacing: Minimum clear space equals height of lowercase 'c'
donts: Don't rotate or skew the logo
Don't change logo colors outside palette

personas.name: Maria Santos
objectives: Spend less time on admin work
Hire a receptionist with proper systems
frictions: Lost leads in DMs - slow response times
Complex CRMs don't fit her workflow
personas.direct_quote: I didn't become an aesthetician to spend my nights tracking leads in a spreadsheet. I need something simple that lets me see everyone who messaged me, reminds me to follow up, and doesn't require a PhD to use.

personas.name: Jessica Thompson
objectives: Make her job easier with better tools
frictions: No central system - multiple apps, notes, sheets
Repetitive responses - typing same info constantly
Blamed for lost leads with no proof of follow-up
personas.direct_quote: I want to do a good job, but I'm fighting against chaos every day. If I had a simple app where I could see all my leads, mark where they are in the process, and get reminded who to call - I'd actually have time to sell instead of just scrambling to keep up.

required_features.name: Lead Capture

required_features.name: Kanban Lead Board
required_features.description: Visual pipeline with drag-and-drop status updates

required_features.name: Follow-up Scheduling
required_features.description: Schedule calls/messages with push notification reminders

required_features.name: Sales Pipeline Workflow
required_features.description: Track leads through stages with status history

required_features.name: Basic Reports
required_features.description: Conversion rate, lead source breakdown, closed sales tracking

required_features.name: Lead Notes
required_features.description: Add notes and view activity timeline per lead

required_features.name: Multi-user Support
required_features.description: Multiple team members can access and manage leads

required_features.name: WhatsApp Click-to-Chat
required_features.description: One-tap to open WhatsApp conversation with lead

required_features.name: Instagram DM Handling
required_features.description: Manual tracking of Instagram inquiries (no API integration)

required_features.name: Treatment Price List
required_features.description: Store and quickly share treatment prices with leads

optional_features.name: WhatsApp Campaign Templates
optional_features.description: Pre-built message templates for common scenarios

screens.name: Splash
screens.navigation: Auto-navigate to Login or Dashboard based on auth state

screens.name: Login
screens.navigation: Success → Dashboard, Forgot → Reset flow, Signup → Registration

screens.name: Dashboard
screens.purpose: Main overview of leads and activity
screens.navigation: Tap card → Filtered view, Tap lead → Lead detail, Bottom tabs for main navigation

screens.name: Lead List
screens.purpose: Full list view with search and filter
screens.navigation: Tap lead → Detail, Swipe → Quick actions, Add → New lead form

screens.name: Lead Detail
key_elements: Quick action buttons (Call, WhatsApp, Email, Schedule)
screens.navigation: Quick actions open respective apps, Status changes update pipeline

screens.name: Kanban
screens.navigation: Drag cards between columns, Tap card → Detail

screens.name: Calendar
screens.navigation: Tap day → Show follow-ups, Tap follow-up → Lead detail

screens.name: Treatments List
screens.navigation: Tap treatment → Edit, Share → Open share sheet

copy.elevator_pitch: Clinic is a mobile CRM that helps aesthetic clinics convert Instagram and WhatsApp inquiries into paying customers by organizing leads, automating follow-ups, and providing sales visibility—all from your phone.
taglines: Stop losing leads. Start closing sales.
From DM to deal, in a single tap.
benefits: See all your Instagram and WhatsApp leads in one place
Visual pipeline shows every lead's status at a glance
Get push notifications when it's time to follow up
Track conversion rates and lead sources automatically
Works entirely from your phone - no desktop required
Set up in 5 minutes, no training needed

differentiators_vs_no_crm.scattered_leads: All leads in one unified view
differentiators_vs_no_crm.no_follow_up: Automatic reminders ensure every follow-up happens
differentiators_vs_no_crm.manual_work: Quick templates and service list at your fingertips

whatsapp_script.initial_response: Hi [Name]! Thanks for reaching out to [Clinic Name]. I'd love to help you with [treatment]. Have you had this treatment before? What's your main goal?
whatsapp_script.follow_up_24h: Hi [Name]! Just checking in on your inquiry about [treatment]. If you have any questions, I'm here to help!
whatsapp_script.pricing:
Here's the info on [treatment]:

[Treatment]: $[price] per session
Package of 3: $[price] (save $XX!)

Would you like me to check availability?

phone_script.greeting: Thank you for calling [Clinic Name], this is [Name], how can I help you today?
phone_script.qualifying: I'd be happy to help! Let me ask a few questions: Have you had [treatment] before? What area are you looking to address?
phone_script.closing: I have availability on [Day] at [Time]. Would you like me to book that for you?

objection_replies.too_expensive: Many clients feel the same initially. Our packages offer savings - want me to break down the options?
objection_replies.need_to_think: Of course! Can I ask what specifically you'd like to think over? Maybe I can help address any concerns.
objection_replies.comparing_clinics: That's fair! What I can share about us is [unique value]. Feel free to look around - I'm here when you're ready.
objection_replies.bad_experience_elsewhere: I'm sorry to hear that. At our clinic, we [specific reassurance]. Would a consultation help you feel more comfortable?
